title: Strengthening Instructional Design Competencies: Internalizing Social Studies Knowledge in Digital Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social studies knowledge and experience with digital device usage
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Learners can apply at least three self-directed learning strategies while analyzing social studies knowledge using digital learning tools
Learners can produce peer feedback-integrated knowledge reconstruction outputs two or more times through online collaborative activities
Learners can write reflective journals after experiencing social phenomenon simulations using smartphone-based AR/VR content

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
